questions.text: Do you feel like you are able to solve important things?

options.text: Yes, I am able to solve everything
Maybe, I am able to solve most things
No, I am not able to solve any important thing

questions.text: Could you manage efficiently important changes right now?

options.text: Yes, I could manage important changes without problems
Maybe, I could manage some important changes
No, I cannot handle any important change

questions.text: Do you feel able to handle personal problems?

options.text: Yes, I could handle personal problems
Maybe, I could handle personal problems
No, I cannot handle any personal problems

questions.text: Do things go as you expect?

options.text: Yes, everything is going as I spected
Some things go as planned while others do not
No, nothing goes as planned

questions.text: Is there something that did not go as you want?

options.text: No, everything goes as planned
Some things are not going as planned
Yes, nothing goes as planned

questions.text: Do you have control over things?

options.text: Yes, I control everything
I have control over some things, I do not over others
No, everything is out of my control

questions.text: Do you feel angry because something happened that you cannot control?

options.text: No, I do not feel angry at all
I feel angry but I can control it
Yes, I feel angry beacuse I lost control

questions.text: Are you planning too many things?

options.text: No, I am planning what I can handle
Maybe, I am not sure if I can acomplish everything
Yes, I planned too many things, I am saturated

questions.text: Do you have control over your time?

options.text: Yes, I control my time
I have control over my time partially
No, I cannot manage my time at all

questions.text: Is there anything that is becoming too difficult (for you) to handle?

options.text: No, everything is easy to handle
I am struggling to solve some tasks
Yes, I find impossible to solve something

questions.text: Are you able to keep your thoughts together and concentrate?

options.text: Yes, I can concentrate completelly
I can concentrate but I might lost the attention time to time
No, I cannot concentrate in anything

questions.text: Can you focus properly?

options.text: Yes, my focus is where I want
I can focus but it is a bit difuse
No, I cannot focus

questions.text: What is your concentration level right now?

options.text: Complete
Medium
No concentration

questions.text: Do you manage to read a complex text right now?

options.text: Yes, I can read a complex text without problems
Partially, I can read complex texts with some difficulty
No, I cannot read a complex text

questions.text: What is your ability in remembering things?

options.text: I remember everything
I remember things but not everything I want
No, I cannot remember anything

questions.text: Do you easily remember names right now?

options.text: I remember every name I know
I remember some of the names I know
No, I cannot remember names

questions.text: How quickly can you remember your last meal?

options.text: Less than 20 seconds
It takes me a while
I cannot remember my last meal

questions.text: Do you forget things more often than before?

options.text: No, I do not forget things
Partially, I forget some things
Yes, I am forgetting everything

questions.text: Are you mentally tired?

options.text: No, my head is at 100%
Partially
Yes, I am completelly tired

questions.text: Do you feel like you are capable to solve your tasks?

options.text: Yes, I can solve all my tasks
Maybe, I could solve some of my tasks
No, I cannot solve any of my tasks

questions.text: Do you feel capable to interact with other people?

options.text: Yes, social activities are not a challenge right now
Partially, I could handle some conversations
No, I cannot handle a proper conversation

questions.text: Does it require more energy to think than usual?

options.text: No, nothing requires more energy than usual
Some things require more thinking than usually
Yes, thinking requires all my energy right now

questions.text: Do you feel slow in thought?

options.text: No, my thoughts are fresh
Maybe, some thoughts come slower than usually
Yes

questions.text: Are tasks taking more time than usual to solve?

options.text: No, all taks require its normal time
Some tasks require more time than usual
Yes, all tasks require more time

questions.text: Does your mind recover quickly from effort?

options.text: Yes, my mind is fresh sortly after efforts
My mind requires sligthly more time to recover than usual
No, my mind needs much more time to recover

questions.text: Do you feel you need a rest?

options.text: No
Maybe
Yes

questions.text: Do you think your rest recharges your batteries?

options.text: Yes, my rest charged my batteries
My rest charged partially my batteries
No my batteries are empty
